info.description: This is the CarRisX.com web application URL API parameter documentation. Future extensions will enable switches for: screenshot, line info, tel info, mail info, FB link, Twitter link, API link, language selection and list of languages, Logo and Logo change, testimonial, copyright, terms, privacy, heading text, subtext and CSS overrides with custom CSS files
info.title: CarRisX WebApp URL API (c) 2019 CarRisX.com

externalDocs.description: List of provinces in Thailand and their short names (Abbr.) for the province parameter

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: Run in test mode, set to true to mark the transmitted data as test data, false if not specified.

parameters.name: debug
parameters.description: Show the debugInfo part of the form.

parameters.name: insClass
parameters.description: The preselected insurance class.

parameters.name: insClassDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the insurance class selection control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: regYear
parameters.description: The preselected cars first registration year.

parameters.name: regYearDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the year selection control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: regBrand
parameters.description: The preselected car brand.

parameters.name: regBrandDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the car brand selection control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: regType
parameters.description: The preselected car type.

parameters.name: regTypeDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the car type selection control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: regModel
parameters.description: The preselected car model.

parameters.name: regModelDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the car model selection control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: dashCam
parameters.description: Specifies if the car has a dash cam.

parameters.name: dashCamDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the car ash cam selection control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: Specifies in which province the car is registered.

parameters.name: provinceDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the car registration province selection control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: usage
parameters.description: Specifies how the car is used.

parameters.name: usageDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the car usage selection control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: includeCMI
parameters.description: Specifies if CMI insurance should be included.

parameters.name: includeCMIDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the selection control for CMI inclusion is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: The predefined partner email address.

parameters.name: partnerDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the partner control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: partnerAddOn
parameters.description: The predefined partner addon info.

parameters.name: partnerAddOnDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the partner addon control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: insurer
parameters.description: The predefined insurer

parameters.name: insurerDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the insurer control is disabled, false if not specified.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: The predefined product.

parameters.name: productDisabled
parameters.description: Specifies if the product control is disabled, false if not specified.
